article_title: Gate.io Supports Frontier (FRONT) to Self Chain (SLF) Token Migration
event_summary: Gate.io will facilitate the migration of Frontier (FRONT) tokens to Self Chain (SLF) tokens at a 1:1 ratio. Various trading services for FRONT will be disabled or adjusted in preparation for this migration.
user_action_required: Users should adjust trading strategies and close positions before specified deadlines to avoid automatic settlement or termination.
quantifiable_changes: Total token supply increases from 90 million to 360 million
